extensionDescription.message: Snooze articles in Pocket to a later time

toastPocketIsGoingAway.message: Pocket is going away. Please check the Pocket blog for more information. This extension will no longer unsnooze items in Pocket, but you can still access the list of items that you snoozed below.
toastPocketIsGoingAway.description: Toast error message about Pocket's cancellation.

panelNothingSnoozed.description: Panel text informing the user that the list of snoozed items is empty.
